original_text: And a chapiter of brass was upon it; and the height of one chapiter was five cubits, with network and pomegranates upon the chapiters round about, all of brass. The second pillar also and the pomegranates were like unto these.
korean_text: 기둥 위에 놋머리가 있어 그 높이가 다섯 규빗이요 머리 사면으로 돌아가며 꾸민 망사와 석류가 다 놋이며 또 다른 기둥에도 이런 모든 것과 석류가 있었더라

sentences.original_text: And a chapiter of brass was upon it;
sentences.korean_translation: 놋으로 만든 기둥머리가 그 위에 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the height of one chapiter was five cubits,
with network and pomegranates upon chapiters round about,
sentences.korean_translation: 기둥머리 둘레에는 그물과 석류 장식이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and the pomegranates were like unto these.
